version_description: Performance improvements and minor bug fixes

1. New location: Zombie Island! Experience a new challenge in a completely different environment.
2. Weekly event added! See if you can handle the Rusty Wastelands hospital.
3. Extract resources, raid for gems, cure as many zombies as possible, and earn legendary characters!
4. New collectible cards added: 9 cards from common to epic and 3 legendary cards that can only be obtained in the Rusty Wastelands.

Reworked and improved tutorial.
 Increased ad bonus (temporary income doubling).
 Minor UX improvements.

A notification system that will help you stay on top of everything that happens in the game.

Minor UX impovements.

Added FAQ section to make it easier for you to understand the game. 
Completely updated and improved the appearance of the storyline character “Doctor Marcus”.
Modules list has been added. Navigating the hospital has never been so easy!

Visual and gameplay improvements added to the first hospital.

Added new collectible cards and helpful employees!

Bug fixes.
